channel.title: Can't connect to Tor
channel.description:
Hi, I'm fairly new to Whonix and while trying use Tor, I keep having this issue here. forums. whonix. org/t/error-tor-bootstrap-result/ 2815 and nothing I've tried so far has worked.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Edit: Problem solved by uninstalling and reinstalling everything.
